name: Gamejammin: OH NO! I forgot about the game jam and need to make a game in a single day!
name_original: Gamejammin: OH NO! I forgot about the game jam and need to make a game in a single day!
description:
In Gamejammin: OH NO! I forgot about the game jam and need to make a game in a single day! Our wonderful hero has woken up and forgotten about the game jam they signed up for. In a rush they brainstorm and play at least one level idea for the jam before uploading it.

Everything but the game editor was made by Lynxieles and Polydeuces specifically for  GBJAM 8. I swear we've been working on this all week you gotta trust us.

The screen size is just zoomed in so you can see it without squinting.. it's aspect ratio is 160x144.

Controls: In the platformer you can kill some enemies by shooting a projectile with B.

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • A: Alt, z, j
  • B: control, k, x
  • Start: Enter
  • Select: Shift

Please inform me if you find any game breaking bugs. I am trying to be as reasonable as I can about make sure you can play it.
